page.title: 09A TYPICAL DAY:SCHOOL BOY
page.content: I wake up at 7.30a.m. I get straight up and have a wash(including my hair!). I go downstairs and eat cornflakes with milk and sugar for my breakfast and then leave for school. It takes me 1/2 an hour to walk to Evelyns Comprehensive School. School starts at 8.45a.m. and finishes at 3.35p.m.We start by having the register taken in our form rooms.Twice a week we have assembly which is not religious.A typical day's lessons would be Science,Maths,History,French and English.After school I generally goes to the computer room to play games.In the evenings there is not much to do around this area.What it really needs is a leisure/sports centre.I usually go to bed at around 11 p.m.
